text_blocks: I see that the current user is in the "External" department. Let me check the project details to understand the permissions.

project.name: Galvanised steel touch-up system
project.description: Touch-up and repair system for galvanised structural steel delivered by CentralSteel Engineering.

text_blocks:
I can see the project exists and is currently in "exploring" status. However, I need to check if I can perform this action. Based on the rules:

1. The current user (Bhwa_152) is in the "External" department
2. The project lead is Bhwa_009
3. Only the project Lead or Corporate Leadership can change project status

As an External department user, I do not have permission to modify project status. External users have very limited access - they cannot access projects in this way.

input.message: Access denied. As an external user, you do not have permission to change project status. Only the project Lead (Bhwa_009) or Corporate Leadership can pause this project.
